name: BabyHelper
0:
”Alexa, open Baby Helper”
”Alexa, tell Baby Helper that baby drank two ounces at 2pm”
”Alexa, ask Baby Helper for status”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: baby helper
des:
Virtual assitant for parents with newborn kids. Baby Helper will happily lend a hand for parents whose hands are busy caring for babies! You can ask the baby helper for status to know when the baby drank last and how much instead of calling up your partner to find out. You can monitor baby's feedings, diapers and sleep. 

When you go for doctor check up for the newborn, first thing they want to see is baby's feedings, wet diapers and bowel movements. With Baby Helper, you dont have to worry about remembering to carry the log book with you, or give a rough estimate or be embarassed to look blank faced (like we did with our baby!). You can open your Alexa app in your phone and say 'Alexa, ask baby helper for history' and show it to the doctor or nurses. As simple as that.

You can say:
Alexa, open Baby Helper
Alexa, ask Baby Helper to set time zone to pacific

One important note: to differentiate between bottle drinking vs feeding from the mother, please use 'drink' for bottle and 'feed' for from mother directly
Alexa, tell Baby Helper that baby drank two ounces at 2pm
Alexa, tell Baby Helper that baby drank 70m.l. at 3 O'clock
Alexa, tell Baby Helper that baby fed for 20 minutes
Alexa, tell Baby Helper that baby pooped
Alexa, tell Baby Helper that baby had a soiled diaper
Alexa, tell Baby Helper that baby had a wet diaper
Alexa, tell Baby Helper that baby peed
Alexa, tell Baby Helper that baby slept at 9am
Alexa, tell Baby Helper that baby woke up just now
Alexa, tell Baby Helper that mommy pumped 50 m.l.

Alexa, ask Baby Helper for status
Alexa, ask Baby Helper for history
Alexa, ask Baby Helper for summary
Alexa, ask Baby Helper when was the last feeding?
Alexa, ask Baby Helper when was the last drink?
Alexa, ask Baby Helper when was the last sleep?
Alexa, ask Baby Helper when was the last wake up?
Alexa, ask Baby Helper when was the last pump?

Alexa, ask Baby Helper to remove last feeding
Alexa, ask Baby Helper to remove last drink

Caring for baby is no easy task. It can be tiring and exhausing. Baby Helper aims to improve your mood by being funny occassionally! Try saying:
Alexa, baby just farted!
Alexa, baby just smiled


If you have any questions, concerns or comments please feel free to contact me here http://pandeti.com/contact.html
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
